forum.content:
（伯斯出發）
這是我的旅遊行程還不錯 可以去試試
day 1-3 （sat.-mon) 2-4/7
auski tourist village family room $150/4
(first day arrive there around 8-9pm)
Hours: 05:30 to 21:00
Location: Corner of Great Northern Hwy and Wittenoom Rd
Phone: 08 9176 6988
shopping nothing


day 4 (Tue,) 5/7
exmouth cape holiday park
multishare mixed 4beds/one room 35person
booking already

exmouth cape holiday park
3 Truscott Crescent, Exmouth, Australia
(08) 9949 1101
shopping: Ningaloo IGA 6:35am-19:00


day 5 (Wed,) 6/7
Ningaloo Club Coral Bay
arrive around 8pm
4 Bed Mini-Dorm$34.00 per person
booking already. waiting for respond

Robinson St, Coral Bay WA 6701
Phone: (61 8) 9385 6655
shopping:
Coral Bay Supermarket & Outdoor Centre
Shop 7/ Coral Bay Arc/ Robinson Street
(prefer prep at exmouth iga, not sure)

day 6 (Thu.) 7/7
denham bay lodge
arrive there around 9pm
4 bunk beds $36 per person
booking already
(be noticed we will arrive there around 9pm)
IGA Mon-Sun: 7:00AM-7:00PM
113 Knight Terrace, Denham
Western Australia 6537

day 7 (Fri.) 8/7
kalbarri Palm Resort
arrive there around 6-7pm
family suit room for
5people/150 37.5/person
booking already

8 Porter Street Kalbarri WA 6536
(08) 9937 2333

Kalbarri IGA 7;00-18：00

day8 (SAT.) 9/7
GERALTON foreshorebackpackers
four people dorm room 52/per person
wolwooths: 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM
